tool_description: Estimates the degree of relationship between individuals based on shared DNA segments and genetic distance metrics.

longest_segment_cm.description: Length of longest shared segment in cM

confidence_level.description: Confidence level: low, standard, high, conservative

population_background.description: Population background: european, african, asian, native_american, mixed

error_messages: Invalid shared DNA amount: shared_dna_cm must be greater than 0.
Invalid longest segment: longest_segment_cm must be greater than 0 and <= shared_dna_cm.
Invalid segment count: segment_count must be a positive integer.
Invalid confidence level: Use one of [low, standard, high, conservative].
Invalid population background: Use one of [european, african, asian, native_american, mixed].
usage: Input the shared DNA metrics from IBD analysis. Set confidence_level higher for more conservative estimates and specify population_background for better accuracy.

generations_back.description: Estimated number of generations to common ancestor
